mapper.select: SELECT REPLY_NO, REPLY_CONTENT, CREATE_DT, BOARD_NO, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NM FROM REPLY JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE REPLY_STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} ORDER BY REPLY_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY VALUES (SEQ_RNO.NEXTVAL, #{replyContent}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, #{memberNo}, #{boardNo})
